languages.text: {n}Вы понимаете, что каким-то образом кардинал сам виновен в произошедшем, но ваши догадки никак не складываются в звучный приговор.{/n}
{n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы понимаете, что каким-то образом кардинал сам виновен в произошедшем, но ваши догадки никак не складываются в звучный приговор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and powerful verdict.{/n}

{n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst, dass der Kardinal irgendwie selbst für seine Situation verantwortlich ist, aber deine Vermutungen lassen sich partout nicht in ein überzeugendes Urteil gießen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst, dass der Kardinal irgendwie selbst für seine Situation verantwortlich ist, aber deine Vermutungen lassen sich partout nicht in ein überzeugendes Urteil gießen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez conscience que le cardinal lui-même est en partie responsable de ce qui s'est passé, mais vos réflexions n'aboutissent pas pour autant à un verdict clair et exemplaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez conscience que le cardinal lui-même est en partie responsable de ce qui s'est passé, mais vos réflexions n'aboutissent pas pour autant à un verdict clair et exemplaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你意识到，从某种程度上而言，当下的情况确实是红衣主教本人的责任，但你的脑海中始终未能形成逻辑严密、令人信服的结论。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你意识到，从某种程度上而言，当下的情况确实是红衣主教本人的责任，但你的脑海中始终未能形成逻辑严密、令人信服的结论。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comprendes que el propio cardenal es el responsable de todo lo ocurrido, pero tus conjeturas no consiguen transformarse en un veredicto claro y convincente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comprendes que el propio cardenal es el responsable de todo lo ocurrido, pero tus conjeturas no consiguen transformarse en un veredicto claro y convincente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは枢機卿自身が今回の出来事の一因であることを理解しているが、その推測は頑なに、明確で説得力のある判決に結実しようとしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは枢機卿自身が今回の出来事の一因であることを理解しているが、その推測は頑なに、明確で説得力のある判決に結実しようとしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir şekilde tüm okların kardinali işaret ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Ancak varsayımların bir türlü elle tutulur ve ikna edici bir yargı hâlini alamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You realise that the cardinal himself is somehow to blame for what happened, but your conjectures are stubbornly failing to crystallise into a clear and compelling verdict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir şekilde tüm okların kardinali işaret ettiğini fark ediyorsun. Ancak varsayımların bir türlü elle tutulur ve ikna edici bir yargı hâlini alamıyor.{/n}
